short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make quick notes in a new Chrome tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly stack new text areas to copy-paste and edit text.
There are also 4 text areas to store more persistent text.

Also provides support for fast text replacements and joins using regexes.
Content can be downloaded to a text file.

This extension is fully private: no data leaves your browser ever. Unlike other similar extensions, there's thus no Google analytics tracking or any other tracking whatsoever. To repeat: NO data from this extension EVER leaves your browser, not even to sync between your chrome browsers.
